com.ephesoft.dcma.util

Class FTPUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.util.FTPUtil

  • public class FTPUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a utility file consisting of various APIs related to different functions that can be performed on a FTP server.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft

                    java.lang.String ftpServerURL,
                    java.lang.String ftpUsername,
                    java.lang.String ftpPassword,
                    java.lang.String ftpDataTimeOut)
                             throws java.net.SocketException,
                                    java.io.IOException
        API for creating connection to ftp server.
        Parameters:
        client - FTPClient the ftp client instance
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException - generate if any error occurs while making the connection.
        java.io.IOException - generate if any error occur while making the connection.

      • uploadDirectory

        public static void uploadDirectory(FTPInformation ftpInformation,
                   boolean deleteExistingFTPData)
                            throws FTPDataUploadException,
                                   java.net.SocketException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        API for uploading a directory on FTP server. Uploading any file requires uploading following a directory structure.
        Parameters:
        sourceDirectoryPath - the directory to be uploaded
        destDirName - the path on ftp where directory will be uploaded
        numberOfRetryCounter - number of attempts to be made for uploading the directory
        Throws:
        FTPDataUploadException - if an error occurs while uploading the file
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while making the ftp connection
        java.net.SocketException - if an error occurs while making the ftp connection

        API to download files from an arbitrary directory hierarchy on the remote ftp server
        Parameters:
        client - FTPClient
        ftpDirectory{{@link - String} the directory tree only delimited with / chars. No file name!
        destDirectoryPath - String the path where file will be downloaded.
